alert.note: Alert for Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Southern High Plains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 13 at 1:59PM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Gates of the Mountains, Cascade County below 5000ft, Judith Basin County and Judith Gap and Southern High Plains. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Cascade County below 5000ft; Gates of the Mountains; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Southern High Plains
